item.title: Petrol Heaven â€” The Rohsm STR-750
item.description: Archived from the original article here ðŸŒ¼ Featured in the Atlantic This article appeared in Issue #6 of the Atlantic Bulletin. You can read it here. The Rohsm STR series is a small racer built for clubs by Rohsm S.p.M., a hundred-year-old company headquartered in the Mediterranean racing culture of Tohs. Its most recent variant, the 750, is available in limited quantities to enthusiast owners and club pools.

item.title: The Oa-Class Battlecruiser
item.description: Archived from the original article here ðŸŒ¼ Featured in the Atlantic This article appeared in Issue #2 of the Atlantic Bulletin. You can read it here. Veklleiâ€™s defensive military posture has, in doctrine and arms development, limited its ability to meaningfully project power outside of the Atlantic. As an island nation with a large and multifaceted naval armada, the Oa-Class Battlecruiser is the heart of her armed forces, as the flagship of her fleets.
